style.description: 样式修改(空白、格式、缺少分号等)
style.title: Styles

refactor.description: 既不修复bug也不添加新功能的更改
refactor.title: Code Refactoring

build.description: 影响构建系统或外部依赖项的更改(示例范围:gulp、broccoli、npm)
build.title: Builds

ci.description: 对CI配置文件和脚本的更改(示例范围:Travis, Circle, BrowserStack, SauceLabs)
ci.title: Continuous Integrations

chore.description: 除src目录或测试文件以外的修改
chore.title: Chores
